reviewText: Just all good stuff. My Lil son just loves these videos
It's great for kids

My grandson received this for Christmas. It is a favorite go-to at granny's house. I have to hide it or we would play it over and over all day. Toy trains is is favorite track. Each and every song is memorized! Bonus video is talking diesel and steam engines that explain how they each work. Excellent. I just purchased this copy to give to a train-addicted play pal for his third birthday. Once he watches it, he will be hooked. I highly recommend this for train loving kids.
My son is crazy about this. He will watch it over and over again. Highly recommended.
Wow awesome video for kids. The music and shots of trains keep kids amused for hours.

Seriously, This is the best Train video for kids out there! My kids just love it, we've watched it a million times! Also, the music and videos are well produced and not annoying like so many other kids videos. A+
My son LOVES this video and I think it's very charming
Yes, my son absolutely loves it! He sings and plays with his trains while watching the DVD repeatedly.
My son loves it. Songs are catchy. Alphabet trains is now part of our bedtime routine.
Super! My grandsons watch it over & over.
My toddler requests this video all the time!
Grandson loves it!
My 2 year old loves this video and watches it multiple times a week.
My grandson likes trains he found it very enjoyable
My son is a train fanatic... He loved the songs...
My three year old train crazy twin boys couldn't get enough of this!
our 6 and 13 year olds like this video.
My 4 year old nephew goes nuts for this DVD. He watches it every time we babysit him.
My grandson loves this dvd...he is always requesting to play it.
Purchased this for my 2 year old great-nephew. He constantly asks to watch it. If your little one is a train lover, they will love this video.
My son love this!
My son loves it. I don't.

I am late posting this review but we were unable to watch this DVD because the disc would not play. I had missed the return window so it was a waste of money for the DVD. But we have since seen the video on Prime and it is one of my boys' favorites with catchy music and lots of train footage. So 5 star video, 1 star DVD.
Every morning my 2 year old wakes up and demands to watch "train songs!"
Kids like the song and watch the trains, but for non train lovers can feel very boring
my 3 yr old son loves this video.
